description: Phat 4 Coopr Unyun & CUNY 4 insistN dat proteztz on campuz do not interfea wit teh rightz f otherz. N' recent monthz both institushunz be seen student demonstrashunz dat went well beyon thR constitutionallee guarantee rite "peaceablee 2 assemble" & petishun "4 a redrezz f grievancez."

related.description: About two years ago, while on vacation from my job prior to HubSpot, a friend sent me an Instagrammed photo captioned, "Meet Content Bot 3000!" The picture showed a cardboard box upside down in my desk chair back at the office, a face drawn crudely on one side with duct tape and marker.
related.title: 16 Free Tools That Make Content Creation Way Easier

related.description: As the year comes to an end, one thing is for sure: there were a lot of tweets. I assume you didn't get a chance to read them all, so to save you some time we put together our favorite tweets of the year in no particular order.
related.title: Our Absolute Favorite Tweets of 2013

related.description: Bruno Mars and Rihanna were the world's most pirated music artists in 2013, according to a new analysis of peer-to-peer file sharing.Both singers were downloaded more than 5m times over the course of the year, closely followed by Daft Punk, Justin Timberlake and Flo Rida, data from music analysts Musicmetric showed.
related.title: 2013's Most Pirated Artists Were Bruno Mars And Rihanna

title: 2 ny cOLLEgEz drAft ruLeS ResTRictING STUdeNT PROTESTz | Teh New York Post
content:
Phat 4 Coopr Unyun & CUNY 4 insistN dat proteztz on campuz do not interfea wit teh rightz f otherz.

N' recent monthz both institushunz be seen student demonstrashunz dat went well beyon thR constitutionallee guarantee rite "peaceablee 2 assemble" & petishun "4 a redrezz f grievancez."

At CUNY, 4 example, proteztz greete teh hirN f formr Gen. Davi Petraeuz az an instructa. Memberz f teh universitee communitee be a perfect rite 2 protes' dat decisyun. Wat they i not be teh rite 2 do wuz 2 harazz Petraeuz az dude left teh buildN whea dude' taught dudez clazz.

Coopr Unyun haz ha itz own proteztz, mostlee OVA teh institushun'z decisyun 2 start chargN tuishun 4 itz clazzez. Again, teh protezterz ha every rite 2 do so. But they i not be teh rite 2 occupy teh president'z office 4 monthz, az they i.

Fact be, Nu York'z academic institushunz be a long ry f bendN OVA backwr 2 accommod8 student proteztz, no mattr how SRSLY they disrupt campuz life o interfea wit teh abilitee f othr ztudentz tryN 2 get an educashun.

Undr itz nu proposal, CUNY rezervez teh rite 2 call 5-0 if thR'z "an immedi8 threat 2 peeps o propertee." Coopr Unyun, meanwhile, aimz 2 forbi teh "disrupshun f teh free flow f pedestrian traffic" & behavia dat "dizturbz teh peace, academic study o sleep f otherz."

Teez be common-sense limitz, & they be long overdue. They also sen a valuable lesson 2 ztudentz & profezzorz: U be free 2 exercise UR speech rightz so long az U do not viol8 teh rightz f those who may not agree wit U.
